item.title: OpenAI’s promise to stay in California helped clear the path for its IPO
Does brand advertising work? Upwave (YC S12) is hiring engineers to answer that
item.description:
As a Senior Software Engineer at Upwave, you’ll be a full-stack problem solver with a backend focus—building the APIs, data pipelines, and systems that power our brand measurement platform. Deliver insights that move millions — enable brand lift analytics and real-time campaign insights by building reliable, high-throughput systems. You collaborate closely with Product to design features that solve real-world problems and delight users.

Read more

item.description:
Navy Fleet Logistics Support Wing. Via this web service, text messages can be sent to the cockpit. Sent messages could be viewed.

item.title: A Year of Fast Apply – Our Path to 10k Tokens per Second
item.description:
Cursor pioneered a flexible workaround to this problem — let the frontier model produce "lazy" diffs and use a small, fast apply model as the merging algorithm. Example of a pathological initial_code, diff pair that is hard to address with a closed-form merging algorithm. The initial code and diff are passed in as model inputs, and the merged code is the output we train the model to produce.

Read more

item.description:
This is a full SQLite query engine. sqlite3 that it can read from. SQLite does 7 page reads for that query.

item.title: Cursor Composer: Building a fast frontier model with RL
item.description:
Blog / ResearchComposer is our new agent model designed for software engineering intelligence and speed. On our benchmarks, the model achieves frontier coding results with generation speed four times faster than similar models. Reinforcement learning allows us to actively specialize the model for effective software engineering.

Read more

item.description:
01One-byte signed displacement follows addressing mode byte(s). 10Four-byte signed displacement follows addressing mode byte(s). 11Register addressing mode.

item.title: Building a Robot Dog (with an airsoft gun)
item.description:
This blog covers my design process, stress testing, and final robot that I built :) After watching some videos of past competitions, I decided that my strategy would be to maximize speed so I could attack opponents from the side and back before they realized what was happening. These are the equations that let you convert between foot X,Y coordinates, and motor angles (theta1, theta2) between each other. This was a really valuable exercise to build design intuition and how all these variables related to each other.

Read more

item.title: Tell HN: Twilio support replies with hallucinated features
item.description:
I was investigating some bug with our voice system and asked support where I can find some debugging information and event logs. They told me where I should go in the interface to see that and reassured that they checked logs and this event exist. The support message with hallucinated features is mostly AI written.

Read more

item.title: Show HN: HUD-like live annotation and sketching app for macOS
item.description:
Draw Over It floats above your desktop and hides with a single hotkey. Right-click the overlay or press ⌃⌥⌘H. Ready to draw over anything.
